  screenshots

Can we onboard the project: [project name].

The website for the project is: [website url].

Using the add-project and capture-screenshot skills, please add this project to the awesome-java-ui repo as markdown and screenshot (with thumbnail).

Use examples such as jline and zk as templates for markdown and screenshots for exsiting onboarded projects.
